Package index

All functions

controls()
Toggle the control panel
debug_mode()
Enable debug mode
format_world_coord()
Format world coordinates in anatomical notation
launch()
Launch the viewer
layer()
Add an overlay layer to the viewer
ortho_event()
Get click event data from ortho_viewer
ortho_events
Ortho Viewer Event Handling
ortho_intensity()
Get intensity values from an ortho_viewer event
ortho_modifier()
Check if a modifier key was held during an event
ortho_proxy()
Proxy object for controlling an orthogonal viewer from Shiny
ortho_viewer()
Orthogonal neuroimaging viewer (htmlwidget shell)
ortho_viewerOutput()
Shiny output for ortho_viewer
ortho_voxel()
Get voxel indices from an ortho_viewer event
ortho_world()
Get world coordinates from an ortho_viewer event
orthoviewer_click_example()
Run an interactive orthoviewer example with click handling
orthoviewer_example_app()
Run a minimal orthoviewer Shiny example
orthoviewer_navigation_example()
Run an interactive orthoviewer example with navigation controls
print(<ortho_event>)
Print method for ortho_event objects
renderOrtho_viewer()
Shiny render function for ortho_viewer
set_title()
Set viewer title
status_bar()
Toggle the status bar
view_ortho()
Create an orthogonal brain viewer
